page.title: 13THROCKLEY.(1)
page.content:
This is a suburb of Newcastle upon Tyne and the area has a balance of residential homes and good views of the River Tyne to the south. Many of the families have lived in Throckley for many years and the residents of grown ups and children enjoy the many open spaces and school areas with ample playing field facility. The children have discovered by walking around the area that there are the following amenities in Throckley:
{A doctor's}- Dr. Brown - his surgery is near the betting shop. {A bank}- at the Co-operative Supermarket. You can get money out and you can put money in. Sometimes banks get robbed. {A public house}- people go to drink and have refreshments. continued......
